Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease
  • Enclosing interface:
    ReconnectFilter<T extends ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent>
    public static class ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease
extends Object
    Return value for ReconnectFilter.onConnectFailed(ConnectFailEvent) and ReconnectFilter.onConnectFailed(ConnectFailEvent). Generally you will only return retry() or doNotRetry(), but there are more advanced options as well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease doNotRetry()
      Return this to stop the connection fail retry loop.
      static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease doNotRetryIf​(boolean condition)
      Returns doNotRetry() if the given condition holds true, retry() otherwise.
      boolean isRetry()
      Returns true for everything except doNotRetry().
      static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retry()
      Return this to retry the connection, continuing the connection fail retry loop.
      static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retryIf​(boolean condition)
      Returns retry() if the given condition holds true, doNotRetry() otherwise.
      static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retryWithAutoConnectFalse()
      Opposite ofretryWithAutoConnectTrue().
      static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retryWithAutoConnectTrue()
      Same as retry(), but autoConnect=true will be passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • retry

        public static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retry()
        Return this to retry the connection, continuing the connection fail retry loop. autoConnect passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback) will be false or true based on what has worked in the past, or on BleNodeConfig.alwaysUseAutoConnect.

      • retryIf

        public static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retryIf​(boolean condition)
        Returns retry() if the given condition holds true, doNotRetry() otherwise.

      • doNotRetry

        public static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease doNotRetry()
        Return this to stop the connection fail retry loop.

      • doNotRetryIf

        public static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease doNotRetryIf​(boolean condition)
        Returns doNotRetry() if the given condition holds true, retry() otherwise.

      • retryWithAutoConnectTrue

        public static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retryWithAutoConnectTrue()
        Same as retry(), but autoConnect=true will be passed to BluetoothDevice.connectGatt(Context, boolean, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback). See more discussion at BleNodeConfig.alwaysUseAutoConnect.

      • retryWithAutoConnectFalse

        public static ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailPlease retryWithAutoConnectFalse()
        Opposite ofretryWithAutoConnectTrue().

      • isRetry

        public boolean isRetry()
        Returns true for everything except doNotRetry().
